item.description:
Let's Join the Fairfield Singles at Captian's Cove




Hey guys and gals! Can you believe IT'S ALMOST SUMMER, Yahoo!!! Come join us at Captain's Cove, our tiny slice of summertime heaven, as we dance the afternoon away to the awesome sounds of "GOOD & PLENTIE"!




GOOD AND PLENTIE


This highly talented and experienced eight piece band, complete with lead front male & female vocalists, horn section and accomplished rhythm section delivers a first-class performance that makes Good and Plentie one of the most in-demand bands in the New York metro area. Over the years, the band has entertained thousands from the stages of Atlantic City and Foxwoods Casinos to the exquisite ballrooms of New York's finest hotels for corporate and other special events.

With an exceedingly diverse and extensive repertoire, the band's versatility can accommodate various musical tastes and please countless of audiences. Good and Plentie can play intimate venues, casinos and nightclubs along with large ballrooms and concert halls with equal effectiveness and ease.

Good and Plentie song list and demo


Please get there before 2:00 PM and help us hold down some tables. When you arrive please see us over by our Meetup table for name tags. ALSO, PLEASE LET US KNOW IF THIS IS YOUR FIRST TIME, SO THAT WE MAY INTRODUCE YOU TO THE GROUP!

There will be a $1 pp Meetup fee to cover our website cost.


Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Meetup Signs on the Deck and the red and white balloons!

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: ALMOST SUMMER! @ CAPTAIN'S COVE with THE GOOD & PLENTIE BAND
